languages.text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Перед этой атакой все противники с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} получают −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Prior to the attack, all prey suffers a -<u>3×(PER bonus)%</u> penalty to armour until the end of combat.
Prior to the attack, all prey suffers a −<u>(3 × PER bonus)</u>% penalty to armour until the end of combat.

Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Перед этой атакой все противники с эффектом {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} получают −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Перед этой атакой все противники с эффектом "добыча" получают −<u>(3 × бонус ВОС)</u>% к броне до конца боя.
Перед этой атакой все противники с эффектом "добыча" получают −<u>(3 × бонус ВОС)</u>% к броне до конца боя.

languages.text: 在赏金猎人攻击之前，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}受到<u>（3×赏金猎人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 在猎人攻击之前，所有猎物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}受到<u>（3×猎人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Antes del ataque, todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presas{/g} sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Antes del ataque, todas las presas sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Vor dem Angriff erleidet sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen Malus von −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Vor dem Angriff erleidet sämtliche Beute bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen Malus von −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Malus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.

languages.text: Avant l'attaque, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % est appliquée à {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}l'armure{/g} de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Avant l'attaque, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % est appliquée à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 攻撃前、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}戦闘終了まで{/g}、アーマーに−<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃前、すべての「獲物」は戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に−<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Saldırıdan önce tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}avlar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerine −%<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ALG{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Prior to the attack, all {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} suffers a −<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.
